title: Ford CEO Jim Farley celebrates $1 billion 'common sense victory'
description: Automakers paid a steep price to satisfy the Biden administration's fuel efficiency goals. While some of that price was used to improve fuel standards...
content:
Automakers paid a steep price to satisfy the Biden administration's fuel efficiency goals.
While some of that price was used to improve fuel standards, automakers also faced steep penalties for a li… [+5255 chars]
